title: Girl's leg is reattached backwards after cancer surgery
text:
Girl's leg is reattached backwards after cancer surgery 01:08
A seven-year-old girl has had her leg amputated and re-attached backwards so her ankle can eventually replace the leg's original knee following a struggle with bone cancer. Ryan Brooks reports.
